family_steps.step_1: Create an instance of `Editor` class with mandatory file path or stream and optional `SpreadsheetLoadOptions` class and load the {{EXT}} file
family_steps.step_2: Create & set the `SpreadsheetEditOptions` class instance for the {{EXT}} file format
family_steps.step_3: Call `Editor.Edit()` method and obtain {{EXT}} document in HTML format that is easily editable with any WYSIWYG-editor.
family_steps.step_4: Call `Editor.Save()` method and save edited {{EXT}} file using `SpreadsheetSaveOptions` class
